column1: '''''haran''''' (pl. ''harni'') is a [[Quenya]] word. In ''[[The Etymologies]]'', its meaning is given as "king, chieftain", related to [[Noldorin]] ''[[aran]]'',  "king".<ref name=Ety>{{LR
column2: Etymologies}}, p. 360</ref> In later appearances, it seems to have been replaced by ''aran'', like in [[Aranwë]].{{fact}}
